negotiator.protocol

Class SimpleMediatorBasedProtocol

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.protocol.ProtocolAdapter
      • negotiator.protocol.MediatorProtocol
        • negotiator.protocol.SimpleMediatorBasedProtocol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Protocol

    public class SimpleMediatorBasedProtocol
extends MediatorProtocol
    Basic implementation of a mediator based protocol.

    Protocol: 
     Mediator proposes an offer
 Agents vote accept/reject
 Mediator Informs parties of result

    • Method Detail

      • getRoundStructure

        public Round getRoundStructure(java.util.List<NegotiationParty> parties,
                      Session session)
        Get the structure of the current round. Each round, this method receives a list of all the NegotiationParty and the complete .Session which can be used to diversify the round structure at some point during the session.
        Specified by:
        getRoundStructure in interface Protocol
        Overrides:
        getRoundStructure in class ProtocolAdapter
        Parameters:
        parties - The parties currently participating
        session - The complete session history
        Returns:
        A list of possible actions

      • getActionListeners

        public java.util.Map<NegotiationParty,java.util.List<NegotiationParty>> getActionListeners(java.util.List<NegotiationParty> parties)
        Get a map of parties that are listening to each other's response
        Specified by:
        getActionListeners in interface Protocol
        Overrides:
        getActionListeners in class ProtocolAdapter
        Parameters:
        parties - The parties to listen to
        Returns:
        A map where the key is a NegotiationParty that is responding to a NegotiationParty.chooseAction(List) event, and the value is a list of NegotiationParty that are listening to that key party's response.

      • getCurrentAgreement

        public Bid getCurrentAgreement(Session session,
                      java.util.List<NegotiationParty> parties)
        Returns the last offer for voting as the current agreement. If the mediator is a RandomFlippingMediator, then we return the last accepted bid of that mediator
        Specified by:
        getCurrentAgreement in interface Protocol
        Overrides:
        getCurrentAgreement in class ProtocolAdapter
        Parameters:
        session - The complete session history up to this point
        parties - The parties involved in the current negotiation
        Returns:
        The current agreement
